title: Cant Login.. After patch
body:
authenticating........


That's all I see.. ive reset I reloaded Repair nothing.... but yet I log into the site with the same log in and password and here its fine game server not ok... anybody else find a fix for this or what could be the issue .. Cmd commands have cleared it either

replies.body:
If you're not able to make it through our authentication servers, it means there's something wrong between your PC and our servers. Our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) offers the most frequent fixes for this, so I strongly recommend starting there.

Hit me up if you still have issues with this after working through the connection guide.
